mapper.insert: INSERT INTO allQnA (title, content, writer, openYN, regDate) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{openYN}, now())
mapper.sql: SELECT allqnaNo, title, writer, content, hit, openYN, regDate FROM allQnA
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM allQnA WHERE allqnaNo = #{allqnaNo} and writer = #{writer}
